name: Leap Frugs
description:
It takes two frugs to tango, but only one can be dinner for Gaunt the Forest Guppy.

Press Space (or A and L if you don't want to share a button with your sister) to lock in your angle and power. Leap over each other on every turn. You have one hundred seconds. Don't dissapoint Gaunt. He's very hungry this time of year.

Made by Luke and Clay Williams in 72hrs for Minijam 106.
